description: The massive gothic mansion at the center of Thriller Bark island-ship where Gecko Moria and his subordinates reside. In this episode, the mansion is severely damaged by Oars' rampage.

keyEvents.title: Cindry's Humanity Resurfaces
keyEvents.description: Inside the mansion, Cindry refuses to save Hogback and smiles at Chopper.
keyEvents.significance: Location where Cindry's humanity breaks through zombie control.

keyEvents.title: Robi-Cho Suplex Attempted
keyEvents.description: Robin and Chopper attempt their combination technique before Oars crashes through.
keyEvents.significance: Location of the first Robi-Cho Suplex attempt.

keyEvents.title: Hogback Crushed by Oars
keyEvents.description: Oars crashes through the mansion, trampling Hogback in the debris.
keyEvents.significance: Location of Hogback's defeat and the mansion's destruction.

statusHistory.reason: Severely damaged by Oars crashing through it

description: The world's largest pirate ship, a massive island-sized vessel commanded by Gecko Moria. In this episode, Oars rampages across various locations on Thriller Bark, disrupting multiple battles.

keyEvents.title: Oars Begins Hunting the Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: Oars begins his rampage across Thriller Bark, hunting for the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: The island becomes the battleground for the climactic Oars confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Oars Challenges the Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: The assembled Straw Hat crew faces off against Oars on Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the major crew battle location.
